---
title: "Colloquium"
output: html_document
---


```{r, cache=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, results='asis'}
library(googlesheets)
library(dplyr)
#gs_ls()
web_df <- gs_title("CCP-CUNY")
ss_df <- gs_read(ss=web_df, ws = 'Colloquium', skip=0)

# sort bib_df by year
ss_df<-ss_df[order(ss_df$Date, decreasing=T),]

dims<-dim(ss_df)

for(i in 1:dims[1]){
  
  cat(c("####",ss_df[i,]$Title)) #title
  cat(c("\n"))
  cat(c(ss_df[i,]$First, ss_df[i,]$Last), sep=" ")
  cat(c(", ", ss_df[i,]$Rank, sep=""))
  cat(c(", ", ss_df[i,]$Department, sep=""))
  cat(c("\n\n"))
  
  cat(c("**Day**: ", ss_df[i,]$Date), sep=" ")
  cat(c("\n\n"))
  cat(c("**Time**: ", ss_df[i,]$Time), sep=" ")
  cat(c("\n\n"))
  cat(c("**Room @ GC**: ", ss_df[i,]$Room), sep=" ")
  cat(c("\n"))
  cat(c("\n"))
  cat(ss_df[i,]$Abstract)
  cat(c("\n"))
  cat(c("\n"))
  cat("------")
  cat(c("\n"))
  cat(c("\n"))
  
  
}



```
